flores_passage: Lekgotla la USA Gymnastics le dumalana le lekwalo la Komiti ya Di-Olimpiki ya Amerika e bo e dumelana le botlhokwa jwa go re botlhe ba ba amanang le di-Olimpiki go rotloetsa tikologo e e sireletsegileng ya batshameki botlhe. Re dumalana le polelo ya USOC ya go re dikgatlhego tsa batshameki le ditlhopha tsa rona, le metshameko ya bone, di ka direlwa botoka ke go gatela pele ka phetogo e e maleba mo teng ga mokgatlho wa rona, go na le go tsaya setifikeiti. Ba sethopha sa USA Gymnastics ba rotloetsa go re go nne le patlisiso e e ikemetseng, e e tla senolang go re kgokgontsho e e kanakana e batswa-setlhabelo ba ga Larry Nassar ba e begileng ka bopelokgale, go tsile jang go re e bo e nnile sebaka se se kana e sa lemogwe; e bile e rotloetsa diphetogo tse di maleba tse di ka tlhokafalang. O ne a dumela ntlha ya gore o ne a tsamaisa diritibatsi, a dira maeto a le mmalwa go ralala Australia.
question: Go ya ka temana,Ke eng seo lekgotla la USA Gymnastics le sa dumalaneng le sone, morago ga gore Nassar a kgokgontshe batshameki?
mc_answer1: Go tlosa leina le o bidiwang ka lone semmuso
mc_answer2: Go tlhola maemo a a maatlafaditsweng
mc_answer3: Diphetogo tse di tlhokegang mo teng ga lekoko

flores_passage: Lekgotla la USA Gymnastics le dumalana le lekwalo la Komiti ya Di-Olimpiki ya Amerika e bo e dumelana le botlhokwa jwa go re botlhe ba ba amanang le di-Olimpiki go rotloetsa tikologo e e sireletsegileng ya batshameki botlhe. Re dumalana le polelo ya USOC ya go re dikgatlhego tsa batshameki le ditlhopha tsa rona, le metshameko ya bone, di ka direlwa botoka ke go gatela pele ka phetogo e e maleba mo teng ga mokgatlho wa rona, go na le go tsaya setifikeiti. Ba sethopha sa USA Gymnastics ba rotloetsa go re go nne le patlisiso e e ikemetseng, e e tla senolang go re kgokgontsho e e kanakana e batswa-setlhabelo ba ga Larry Nassar ba e begileng ka bopelokgale, go tsile jang go re e bo e nnile sebaka se se kana e sa lemogwe; e bile e rotloetsa diphetogo tse di maleba tse di ka tlhokafalang. O ne a dumela ntlha ya gore o ne a tsamaisa diritibatsi, a dira maeto a le mmalwa go ralala Australia.

mc_answer4: Go tsweletsa tikologo e e sireletsegileng ya batshameki

flores_passage: "Babueledi ba ba tumileng ba Greek, Sakis Kechagioglou le George Nikolakopoulos ba tshegeditswe kwa Athens, mo kgolegelong ya Korydallus, ba sena g bonwa molato wa go dirisa botlhaswa maemo a bo ne go ikhumisa le wa tshenyetso sechaba. Ka ntlha ya se, matlhabisaditlhong mo setlhopha sa sa ithutetseng molao, se upoloditse ditiro tse di seng ka fa malaong tsa baatlhodi, babueledi, ba ba ithutetseng molao, le diagente ba di dirileng ngwaga tse di fetileng. Dibeke tse di mmalwa tse di fetileng, morago ga molaetsa o o anamisitsweng ke mmegadikgang Makis Triantafylopoulos mo lenaneong la gagwe la thelebishine le le tumileng la ""Zoungla"" mo Alpha TV, leloko le la Palamente gape e le mmueledi, Petros Mantouvalos o ne a rolwa maemo jaaka maloko a ofisi ya gagwe ba ne ba amega mo go ikhumiseng ba dirisa maemo a bone le tshenyetso sechaba. Mo godimo ga se, moatlhodi wa maemo Evangelos Kalousis o tshegeditswe kwa kgolegelong, a se na go bonwa molato wa tshenyetso sechaba le go tlhoka go itshwara sentle."

flores_passage: Loeto ka sefofane e ka nna maitemogelo a a tshosang mo bathong ba dingwaga tsotlhe, ba matshelo a a farologaneng, segolobogolo fa ba ise ba ke ba palame sefofane kgotsa ba kile ba itemogela maemo a a tshosang thata. flores_passage: Dikomponi tsa baisi di duelwa sentle go romela dilo ka potlako. Gantsigantsi nako e botlhokwa fela thata ka dipampiri tsa kgwebo, dithoto tse di rekisiwang, dikarolo tse di dirisiwang go baakanya ka potlako. Mo di tseleng tse dingwe, dikompone tse di tona di na le difofane tsa tsone, mme mo ditseleng tse dingwe le dikompone tse dinnye go nnile le bothata. Fa ba rometse dilo ka sefofane, mo ditseleng tse dingwe ne go tsile go tsaya malatsi go pagolola dilo le go di fetisa kwa baemeding ko maelong a difofane. Tsela fela ya go netefatsa go re e feta ka bonako e ne e le go e fetisa jaaka dithoto tse di lebilweng. Melawana ya difofane e ka se letle go romela dithoto kwa ntle ga mopalami, jaanong ke gone fa wena o tsenang teng.

question: Go ya ka temana,ke efe ya ditemosi tse di latelang, tse di ka kgorelediwang ke go nwa nnotagi thata?

flores_passage: Nwang bojalwa ka tekanyetso. Bojalwa bo ama mongwe le mongwe ka tsela tse di sa tshwaneng, go itse selekanyo sa gago go botlhokwa. Kgonagalo ya ditiragalo tsa nako e telele tsa botsogo tse di bakwang ke go nwa nnotagi phetelela di ka akaretsa go senyega ga sebete le e leng bofofu le loso. Kotsi e e ka nnang gone e a okediwa ke fa o nwa bojalwa jo bo dirwang ka tsela e e sa letlelesegang ka fa molaong. Dinotagi tse di seng mo molaong di na le dikhemikhale tse di kotsi jaaka methanol, e e ka tlholang bofofu kgotsa loso le fa e ka nna e nnyane fela.
question: Jaaka go tlhalositswe mo temaneng, ke eng se se kgonang go fokotsa ditlamorago tse di kotsi tsa bojalwa?
mc_answer2: Go nwa bojalwa jo bo dirwang ka tsela e e sa letlelesegang
mc_answer4: Go nwa le batho ba bangwe

flores_passage: Kgaolo ya Canal (e e bidiwang Grachtengordel ka se-Dutch) ke kgaolo e e tumileng ya dingwageng tsa makgolo a 17, e e dikologileng Binnenstad mo Amsterdam. Kgaolo yotlhe e beetswe thoko go nna Lefelo la Ngwao la Lefatshe la UNESCO ka ntlha ya setso se se kgethegileng le boleng jwa ditso, e bile ditlhwatlhwa tsa ditsha teng ke dingwe tsa tse di kwa godimo ga gaisa mo nageng.
question: Ke kae moo tlhwatlhwa ya ditsha e leng magareng ga tse di kwa godimo go gaisa mo Amsterdam?
mc_answer2: Mo lefelong lengwe le lengwe le le beetsweng thoko go nna Lefelo la Ngwao la Lefatshe la UNESCO
mc_answer3: Mafelo a a ntshitsweng mo Binnenstad

flores_passage: Kgaolo ya Canal (e e bidiwang Grachtengordel ka se-Dutch) ke kgaolo e e tumileng ya dingwageng tsa makgolo a 17, e e dikologileng Binnenstad mo Amsterdam. question: Goreng Kgaolo ya Canal e beetswe thoko go nna Lefelo la Ngwao la Lefatshe la UNESCO?
mc_answer1: Boleng ba kwa re tswang le setso
mc_answer2: Dilo tsa yone tse di tlhomologileng
mc_answer3: Lefelo la yone, le le dikologileng Binnenstad
mc_answer4: Setsha sa yone se se tlhwatllhwa godimo

flores_passage: Phnom Krom e dikhilomithara di le 12 kwa borwa-bophirima jwa Siem Reap. Tempele e, e e kwa setlhoeng sa thota e agilwe kwa bowelong jwa lekgolo la bo-9 la dingwaga, ka nako ya puso ya ga Kgosi Yasovarman. Loapi le le sa apogang la tempele, le tubego ya lecha la Tonle Sap go dira go oketsa serodumo sa go pagama thota e. Mosepele wa go etela lefelo le o kgona go kopannwa fela le leoto la sekepe go ya kwa lekadibeng. Teseletso ya Angkor Pass e a tlhokafala fa o batla go tsena mo tempeleng e, ka jalo, netefatsa go re ga o a tlogela teseletso ya ga go ya mesepele fa o ya ko Tonle Sap.
question: Go ya ka temana, ke efe ya tse di latelang, e e dirang gore go etela Phnom Krom go go tswele molemo?
mc_answer1: Se o se bonang fa o le godimo ga Tonle Sap
mc_answer2: Go tsamaya go ralala Angkor Pass
mc_answer4: Leeto la sekepe go ya kwa lekadibeng

mc_answer1: Go palama ka kwa ga tempele ya Yasovarman
mc_answer2: Go tsamaya gotlhe mo Siem Reap
mc_answer4: Go tsamaya ka sekepe gotlhe mo Tonle Sap

flores_passage: Antarctica ke lefelo le le tsididi go gaisa mo Lefatsheng. Le dikologile South Pole. Maeto a bojanala a tlhwatlhwa godimo, a tlhoka boitekanelo mo mmeleng, e bile go ka etiwa fela ka selemo mo kgweding tsa Ngwanatsele go fitlha go Tlhakole, e bile ga ntsi a felela fela mo pheninsulareng, le tlhaketlhake, le Lewatle la Ross. Go na le badiri ba ba ka tshwarang dikete tse pedi, ba ba nnang teng ka paka ya selemo, mo metsaneng e e ka nnamng masome a matlhano a a mo mafelong ao; ba le palo potlana ba tswelela ba nna teng le go le mariga. Boteng jwa Antarctica ke setlhaba se se senang sepe, se aperwe ke metsi a a gatsetseng, a a boteng jwa dikhilomithara tse gareng ga 2 le 3. Go a tle go nne le maeto a bojanala a difofane a a tsenelelang mo bogareng, go ya go palama dithaba kgotsa go goroga ko South Pole - kwa go nang le motsana o mogolwanyane teng.
question: Go ya ka temana, ke efe ya tse di latelang, e e neng e ka thibela mojanala gore a se etele Antarctica?
mc_answer1: Tlhwatlhwa godimo ya maeto a bojanala
mc_answer2: Kgatlhego e le yosi, ya go tlhotlhomisa Lewatle la Ross
mc_answer3: Lenaneo la tiro le le kgontshang mosepele ka Sedimonthole le Ferikgong
mc_answer4: Tsamaiso ya mmele e e lekanyeditsweng

question: Mojanala yo o kgatlhegelang go palama dithaba a ka nne a etela karolo efe ya Antartica?
mc_answer2: Lefelo le mo gare ga lefatshe

flores_passage: Mafelo a tshekatsheko ya loapi le dinaledi a pele, ga ana ditsompelo tsa se-gompieno, ka jalo a siilwe ke nako. Bontsi ja one jaanong a dirisiwa e le metlobo ya ditso kgotsa mafelo a thutelo. E re ka kgotlelo ya lesedi mo nakong ya bone ya katlego e ne e se bothata jaaka fa e le bothata gompieno, ga ntsi di fitlhelwa kwa ditoropong kgotsa kwa mafelong a bonno, go le motlhofo go a fitlhelela go na le tse di agilweng mo metlheng ya segompieno. Bontsi di-telescope tsa dipatlisiso tsa segompieno ke dikago tse di boitshegang mo mafelong a a kgakala a a nang le maemo a atemosefiere a a nametsang.
question: Ke kae moo lefelo la tshekatsheko ya loapi le dinaledi la pele le ka se nne gone thata?
mc_answer1: Mo lefelong le le fitlhelelwang motlhofo
mc_answer4: Mo lefelong la bonno la mo kholetšhe

mc_answer2: Mo lefelong la bonno la yunibesithi

flores_passage: Go na le mafelo a mantsi a lotshitshi lwa lewatle, ka go nne Auckland e ikadile mo maemelong a dikepe a le mabedi. A a tumileng go gaisa a one a mo mafelong a le mararo. Matshitshi a lewatle a a kwa bokone (kwa Bokone jwa Kgaolo ya Boemakepe) a mo Lewatleng la Pacific mme a ikadile go tswa kwa Long Bay kwa bokone go ya Devonport kwa borwa. Otlhe fela a batla e le mabopo a a nang le motlhaba e bile go babalesegile go thuma mo go one, mme bontsi jwa one bo na le meriti e e dirwang ke ditlhare tsa pohutukawa. Matshitshi a Tamaki Drive a mo Boemakepeng jwa Waitemata, mo mafelong a bahumi a Mission Bay le St Heliers kwa Central Auckland. Ka dinako tse dingwe matshitshi ano a a bo a tletse ka malapa ka mabenkele a a farologaneng a a mo letshitshing. Go thuma koo go babalesegile.
question: Go ya ka temana,ke lefelo lefe le le ka tshwanelang go gaisa, letsatsi la go itheetsa kwa lotshitshing la lewatle?

flores_passage: Tsweetswee gakologelwa go re tota o etela lefelo la mabitla a mogoso, mmogo le lefelo le le nang le bokao jo bogolo go gaisa mo karolong e kgolo ya baagi ba lefatshe. Go santse go na le banna le basadi ba le bantsi ba ba tshelang ba ba falotseng nako ya bone fano, le ba bangwe ba bantsi ba ba nang le batho ba ba ba ratang ba ba bolailweng kgotsa ba berekisitswe go fitlha ba swa teng, Majuta le ba e seng Majuta ka go tshwana. Re kopa le neele lefelo le seriti, boikano le tlotlo yothe e le e tlhokang . Le seke la dira metlae ka Holocaust kana DI-Nazi. Se senye lefelo ka go tshwaya kana go kgwarinya motako mo mafelong ano.
question: Fa o etela lefelo le le tlhalositsweng mo temaneng, ke efe ya tse di latelang e e ka tsewang e sa tshwanela?
mc_answer2: Go tlogela matshwao gongwe mo lefelong

flores_passage: Dipuo tse di thusang ke dipuo tsa maitirelo kgotsa tse di itlhametsweng ka boikaelelo jwa go dira go re go nne le puisano magareng ga batho ba ka tsela nngwe ba go fitlhelang go le thata go buisana. Di kwa thoko fa di bapisiwa le lingua francas, tse e leng tsa tlholego kgotsa dipuo tse di tshelang tse e leng tsone tse di eteletseng pele ka ntlha ya lebaka le le rileng kgotsa le sele go re go puisano e kgonagale magareng ga batho ba ba buang dipuo tse dingwe.
question: Ke efe ya tseno e e tlhalosang dipuo tsa lingua francas?

flores_passage: Dipuo tse di thusang ke dipuo tsa maitirelo kgotsa tse di itlhametsweng ka boikaelelo jwa go dira go re go nne le puisano magareng ga batho ba ka tsela nngwe ba go fitlhelang go le thata go buisana. question: Ke polelo efe e e sa tlhaloseng dipuo tse di thusang ka nepagalo?
mc_answer1: Ke dipuo tse di tshelang, tse di thusang gore puisano e kgonagale magareng ga batho ba ba buang dipuo tse dingwe
mc_answer2: Ke dipuo tsa maitirelo, ebile e le tse di itlhametsweng
mc_answer3: Ke dipuo tse di itlhametsweng ka boikaelelo jwa go dira gore go nne le puisano magareng ga batho ba ka tsela nngwe ba go fitlhelang go le thata go buisana
mc_answer4: Ke dipuo tse di itlhametsweng, tse e leng tsone tse di eteletseng pele magareng ga batho ba ba buang dipuo tse di farologaneng

flores_passage: Fa o kgabaganya Bokone jwa Baltic ka mariga, leba go re ntlwana e ko kae, jaaka go tsamaya mo metsing a a gatsetseng go tlhola modumo o o sa jeseng monate go ba ba amegileng. Go tsamaya ka sekepe mo Saint Petersburg go akaretsa go tsamaya mo toropong. Bapagami ba sekepe ga ba tlhoke go nna le visa (leba melawana).
question: Go ya ka temana,mopagami o tshwanetse a lebe eng fa leeto la bone la sekepe le le ka mariga?
mc_answer4: Nako e e feditsweng mo toropong

flores_passage: Diteme tsa semmuso tsa Barcelona ke se-Catalan le se-Spain. Selekano se se ka nnang sephatlo sa batho, se ikgethela go bua se-Catalan, bontsi bo a se tlhaloganya, mme bontsinsti ja batho ba itse se-Spain. Le fa go ntse jalo, bontsi jwa matshwao a bonala fela ka se-Catalan ka go nne e tlhomilwe ka molao jaaka puo ya pele ya bosechaba. Mme, puo ya se-Spanish e buiwa ka bontsi mo dipalangweng tsa sechaba le mafelo a mangwe. Ka tlwaelo dikitsiso mo Metro di dirwa fela ka se-Catalan, mme dikgoreletsego tse di sa rulaganngwang di goeletswa ka maranyane a a itirisang, ka dipuo tse di farologanyeng, go akaretsa se-Spain, Sekgoa, Se-Fora, Se-Arabea le Se-Japane.
question: Goreng Secatalan se dirisiwa kgapetsakgapetsa mo matshwaong le dikitsisong mo Barcelona?
mc_answer1: Se tlhaloganngwa ka bontsi go feta se-Spanich
mc_answer2: E ne e le leleme la semmuso la ntlha la toropo
mc_answer3: Batho ba ikgethela leleme leo kwa Barcelona
mc_answer4: Mo Metro le mafelo a mangwe a bosetšhaba, go tla bontsi jwa baagi ba ba buang Secatalan

question: Ke efe ya diteme tse di latelang e e diriswang ke tsamaiso ya Metro ya kwa Barcelona go dira dikitsiso tsa ka metlha?

flores_passage: Mo mafatsheng a a tlhabologileng gompieno, go gweba ka go fa batho boroko jwa bed-and-breakfast ja maemo a a ko godimo, go tseelwa ko go dimo fela thata ke bang ba mafelo a teng. Fa go lebilwe maroko a madi a a kwa godimo, mafelo a di-B&B a phadisanya thata ka dilo tse pedi: boleng jwa dikobo le dijo tsa mo mosong. Ka tshwanelo, kwa mafelong a maemo a a kwa godimo, o ka fithela malao a alotsweng ka mabaibai - gongwe kojwana e e rokilweng ka diatla; kgotsa bolao jwa boleng jo bo kwa godimo, jo bo dirilweng bogologolo. Difitlholo di akaretsa dijo tse di monate tsa setlha se se rileng tsa kgaolo kgotsa sejo sa molaletsi se se kgethegileng. Setheo e katswa e le kago ya bogologolo e na le didirisiwa tse dintle tsa bogologolo, e nale ditlhare tse dintle tse di tlhokomelwang, le lefelo la go thuma.
question: Go ya ka temana,ke efe ya ditlamelo tse di latelang e e ka se tseelweng kwa godimo ke bed and breakfast ya maemo a a kwa godimo?
mc_answer3: Ditlhare tse dintle , tse di tlhokomelwang

mc_answer2: Dijo tse di monate tsa setlha se se rileng tsa kgaolo

flores_passage: Toropokgolo ya China, Beijing e tla tshegetsa metshameko ya Olympics Winter Games ka 2022. Se se tla dira toropo e yone ya ntlha go tshegetsa metshameko ya Olympics ka mariga le selemo. Mokete ya pulo le wa go tswalelwa ga metshameko ya ”Indoor Ice Events” e tla tshwarelwa ko Beijing. Ditiragalo tse dingwe tsa go relela mo serameng (skiing) di tla tshwarelwa kwa lefelong la itheletsho mo serameng la Taizicheng kwa Zhangjiakou, le le dikhilomithara tse makgolo a mabedi le masome mabedi (dimmaele tse di lekgolo le masome nane) go tswa Beijing.
question: Go ya ka temana,ke efe ya tse di latelang tse di ka se tshwarelweng kwa Beijing ka 2022?
mc_answer2: Ditiragalo tsa go relela mo serameng kwa Taizicheng
mc_answer3: Mokete wa go tswalelwa ga metshameko

mc_answer2: Ditiragalo tsa go relela mo serameng di tshwarelwa mo teng ga lefelo
mc_answer4: Mekete ya go tswalelwa ga metshameko

flores_passage: Mohikelo wa dinonyane, o itsegeng ka leina la avian influenza, o kgona go tsena dinonyane le ditshedi tse dingwe. Ke dikgetse tse di kwa tlase ga di le sekete tse di setseng di tlhatlhetswe mo bathong, mme tse dingwe di ne di le masisi. Gantsi go amega batho ba ba berekang le dikoko le dipidipidi, mme fela le balebeledi ba dinonyane le bone ga ba a sireletsega.
question: Ke mang a leng kotsing thata ya go tshwaediwa ke mohikelo wa dinonyane?
mc_answer2: Batho ba ba dirang le diamusi
mc_answer3: Batho ba ba berekang le dikoko le dipidipidi
mc_answer4: Batho ba ba e neng e ba tshwere mo nakong e e fetileng

question: Go ya ka temana,ke efe ya dipolelo tse di latelang, tse di tlhalosang ka nepagalo,mohikela wa dinonyane?
mc_answer1: Ba ba berekang le dikoko le dipidipidi, ke bone fela ba ba tshwaeditsweng ke mohikela
mc_answer2: Go begilwe dikgetse di le dintsi mo bathong go feta mo dinonyaneng
mc_answer3: Balebeledi ba dinonyane ba mo kotsing ya go tshwaediwa
mc_answer4: Dikgetse tsotlhe tse di begilweng mo bathong, diphelelo e nnile loso

flores_passage: Batho ba kgaolo ya Scandanavia ba lankane ba ba itsegeng ka leina la Vikings ba ne ba tsamaya mo dinokaneng tsa Russia go goroga kwa lewatleng la Black Sea le la Caspian Sea. Dikarolwana tsa metlhala e di santse di ka dirisiwa. Tlhomamisa go re a o tlhoka teseletso e e haphegileng, e e ka tswang e se motlhofo go bonwa. White se-Baltic Canal e golaganya Arctic ocean le Baltic Sea, e heta ka Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga le Saint Petersburg, thata ka dinoka le macha. Lecha la Onega le lone le golaganye le Volga, ka jalo o santse o kgona go tswa Caspian Sea o feta ka Russia.
question: White Sea–Baltic Canal e golanyanya eng?
mc_answer1: Lewatle la Black Sea le la Caspian Sea

flores_passage: Fa o fologa sefofane, sekepe kgotsa koloi, ga ntsi o simolola ka go ema fa ba taolo-mesepele ba tlhodumetsang matlho mo dithotong tsa ga go. flores_passage: Singapore ke lefelo le le sireletsegileng gape ga le timetse fa o tsamaya mo go lone, le gone o kgona go reka sengwe le sengwe teng fa o sena go goroga. Mme ka lefelo la teng le gaufi thata le mola wa equator (ka fa ntlheng ya bokone jwa one), o tlaa tshwanelwa ke go mekamekana le diemo tsa mogote (wa sennela ruri), le go tshujwa ke letsatsi (fa loapi le apogile - mme mo ga go direge gantsi).
question: Ke efe ya dikgang tse di latelang, e e ka nneng ya tlhagelela thata fa o nna kwa lefelong le le gaufi thata le mola wa equator kwa Singapore?
mc_answer2: Go sa nne le phitlhelelo ya mabenkele
mc_answer3: Go felelwa ke maatla ka ntlha ya mogote

flores_passage: Marotho a seJeremane a monate, e bile a ko Bavaria ke a boleng jo bo ko godimo, a le mefuta e e farologanyeng - a batlile go tshwana le a baagisanyi ba ka fa borwa, ba Austria. Di-pastry tsa maungo di tlwaelesegile. Tse di apeilweng ka diapole di nna teng ngwaga otlhe, fa tsa maungo a cherry le plum di bonala ka paka ya selemo. Bontsi jwa dijo tse di bakilwang ke ma-Geremane di na le di-almond, di-hazelnut le manoko a ditlhare tse dingwe. Dikuku tse di ratiwang thata tsone ga ntsi di tsamaelana thata le kopi ya kofi e e bogale. Fa o batla marothonyana a mannye mme a le boleng, leka se, go tswa ka kgaolo e o leng mo go yone, se ka bidiwang Berliner, Pfannkuchen kgotsa Krapfen.
question: Ke mang a ka batlang go sa je marotho a Sejeremane?
mc_answer1: Mongwe yo mmele wa gagwe o ganwang ke manoko ka tsela e e masisi
mc_answer2: Mongwe yo o ratang diphuding tse di nontshang go feta tse dingwe
mc_answer3: Mongwe yo o sa rateng tšhokolete
mc_answer4: Mongwe yo o ratang tatso e e botshe thata go na le tatso ya letswai

flores_passage: "Fa o batla go bona lefatshe ka tlhwatlhwa e e ko tlase, e le ka letlhoko kgotsa monate wa botshelo kgotsa dikgwetlho, go na le mokgwawa go dira jalo. Tota, go ga bedi: Ke go theogela o ntse o le mo loetong kgotsa go leka go fokotsa tiriso ya madi. Mokwalo o, o itebagantse le ntlha ya bofelo. Ba ba ikemiseditseng go latlhegelwa ke manobononobo, nako le tebelopele go re ba fokotse tshenyegelo ya madi, ba lebe ""minimum budget travel"". Go tseelwa go re batsamai ga ba utswe, go tsena fela ba sena tetla, go tsaya karolo mo mmarakeng kwa ntle ga molao, go kopa, kgotsa go tshwara ba bangwe makgwakgwa ka ntlha ya go ipoonela sengwe."
question: Go ya ka temana,ke efe ya tse di latelang tse e ka nnang ntlha ya kakantsho ka “traveling on a budget”?
mc_answer1: Go theogela o ntse o le mo loetong
mc_answer4: Fokotsa ditshenyegelo jaaka dijo le bonno

flores_passage: Sekgala se se fa gare ga Point Marion le Fairmont se tsenya dingalo go gaisa fa o kgweetsa mo tselafefong ya Buffalo-Pittsburgh, e e fetang ga ntsi mo ditseleng tse di ralalang dikgwa. Fa o sa tlwaela go kgweetsa mo ditseleng tsa mo nageng, o nne o le kelotlhoko: go mefologelo, ditselana tse di tshesane, le metsopodia ya tsela e e segogoropo. Selekanyo se se supilweng sa lobelo se lemotshega fa sele ko tlase mo dikarolong tse di fetileng le tse di latelang, — ka tlwaelo ke 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h), — mme go obamela molao wa tsone o o gagametseng go botlhokwa le e leng go feta go na le go se dire jalo. Goa makatsa, tirelo ya mogala, e botoka fela thata fano go na le mafelo mangwe mo tseleng eno, jaaka kwa Pennsylvania Wilds ka sekai.
question: Ke efe ya dipolelo tse di latelang, e e sa tlhaloseng ka go nepagala,go kgweetsa magareng ga Point Marion le Fairmont?
mc_answer1: Go na le ditsela tse di telele tsa mafelo a a kwa kgakala
mc_answer3: Selekanyo se se supilweng sa lobelo ga se gantsi se latelwa
mc_answer4: Tirelo ya mogala wa letheka ga e a tshwanela go nna e bothata

flores_passage: Go tsena mo koloing ya ga go o bo o tsaya loeto lo lo leele go itumedisa thata ka go sa tsenye dingalo. Fa o tshwantshanya dikoloi tse dikgolwane le ya ga go, o tshwanetse o bo o tlwaetse go kgweetsa ya ga go mme e bile o itse makowa a yone. Go tlhoma tente mo lelwapeng la mong kgotsa toropo go sa kgathalesege go re e botona bo kae go kgona go go biletsa dira. Ka bokhutshwana go dirisa koloi ya gago go tsaya loeto lwa koloi go siame, mme gase tsela e e siametseng go kampa. O ka kampa mo koloing fa o na le bene e tona, koloi ya modiro wa SUV, sedan kgotsa Station Wagon e e nang le ditilo tse o kgonang go di robatsa.

mc_answer2: Koloi e e nang le ditilo tse o kgonang go di robatsa
mc_answer4: Go tlhoma tente mo lelwapeng la mong

flores_passage: Toropo ya gompieno ya Casablanca e simolotswe ke batshwari ba ditlhapi ba ma-Berber ka dingwaga tsa lekgolo la bolesome BCE, mme e ne ya dirisiwa ke Bafonekia, Baroma, le Bamereniti jaaka ka boemakepe jo botlhokwa jo bo bidiwang Anfa. Ma-Potokisi ba ile ba di thuba mme ba tswa ba di aga sesha ka leina la Casa Branca, mme morago ga moo ba di ikgatolosa morago ga thoromo ya lefatshe ya ngwaga wa 1755. Kgosikgolo wa Morocco o ne a e aga gape toropo e, a e bitsa Daru I-Badya; e bo e neelwa leina la Casablanca ke bagwebi ba Spain ba ne tlhoma mafelo a kgwebo teng. Casablanca ke nngwe ya mafelo a sa kgathiseng go reka mo go one ko Morocco. Gaufi le Medina wa pele go motlhofo go bona mafelo a a rekisang dilwana tsa se-Morocco, jaaka setshu, dilwana tsa letsopa, dilo tsa letlalo, di-hooka, le motlele wa di-geegaw, mme tsotlhe tse ke tsa bajanala.
question: Go ya ka temana, Ke mang yo o agileng Casablanca seša lokgetlho lwa bobedi?

flores_passage: Go ela kwa bokone e bile go fitlhelega bonolo ke toropo ya marato le e e kgatlhang ya Sintra le e e neng ya tumisiwa ke batswantle morago ga pego e ntle ya bontle jwa yone e e begilweng ke Lord Byron. Bese ya Scotturb 403 e ya kgapetsakgapetsa kwa Sintra, e bo e ema kwa Cabo da Roca. Gape go ela kwa bokone etela Boitshepo jo bogolo jwa Mohumagadi wa Rona Fatima (Tempele), lefelo la lefatshe lotlhe la modimo o o itsegeng Marian.
question: Go ya ka temana,Sintra e ne ya tumisiwa ke eng magareng ga batswantle?
mc_answer3: Pego e ntle, e e begilweng ke Lord Byron

flores_passage: Ka 1994, kgaolo ya Nagorno-Karabakh, ya batho ba letso la se-Armenia, mo lefatsheng la Azerbaijan, e ne ya bolotsa ntlwa kgatlhanong le batho ba letso la se-Azeri. Ka tshegetso ya ba Armenia, go ne ga tlhangwa lefatshe le lesha, mme fela fela ga se lefatshe le letseewang tsiya ke mafatshe a mangwe le la Armenia tota. Dingangisano tsa sepolitiki kaga kgaolo di tsweletse ka go goga goga mo seretseng dikamano tsa magareng ga Armenia le Azerbaijan.

flores_passage: Sengwe sa dilo tse di dirang go re lefelo la Charlotte kwa North Carolina le bo le le botoka thata, ke go bo le na le mafelo a maemo a a kwa godimo a le mantsi a kwa go one batho ba lelwapa lotlhe ba ka ijesang monate. Go le ga ntsi banni ba mafelo a mangwe ba kaya fa go bo lefelo leo le siametse malwapa e le lebaka la kokono le le dirileng go re ba hudugele koo, mme le ba ba jelang nala teng ba bona go le motlhofo go le akola le bana ba le teng. Mo dingwageng tse di masome a Mabedi tse di fetileng, palo ya tsamaiso e e amogelang maikutlo a bana ko Uptown Charlotte e godile ka palo e e kgatlhisang e e ko godimo. Ga se ga ntsi ba malapa a Charlotte ba dirisa ditekisi, le fa gone di le mosola mo mabakeng a a rileng. Go na le tuelo ya tlaleletso fa bapagami ba feta 2, ka jalo jaana go tura go feta selekanyo.

flores_passage: Pele ga ba-Spain ba goroga mo lekgolong la bo-16 la dingwaga, Chile e e kwa bokone e ne e busiwa ke Inca fa batho ba ba tlholegang kwa Araucania (Mapuche) ba ne ba nna mo bogareng le borwa jwa Chile. Morafe wa Mapuche o ne gape e le o mongwe wa merafe e e tlholegileng kwa Amerika mme ya ikemela ka bo yone, e e neng e sa tsenngwa ka botlalo mo pusong ya ba ba buang se-Spanish go fitlhela fa Chile e se na go ikemela ka bo yone. Le fa Chile e nnile le boipuso ka 1810 (mo gare ga dintwa tsa Napoleon tse di tlogetseng Spain e sena puso ya bogareng e e berekang ka dingwaga di le mmalwa), go fenngwa go go feletseng ga ba-Spain ga go a ka ga fitlhelelwa go fitlha ka 1818.

mc_answer2: Morafe o o tlholegileng kwa America
mc_answer3: Batho ba ba tlholegileng kwa Araucania

flores_passage: Clique Terra, mo go rayang Mafelo a Matlhano, ke metsana e metlhano e e mo letshitshing la lewatle ya Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza le Monterosso, mo kgaolong ya Ithali ya Liguria. flores_passage: Se se sebakang dikotsi thata mo marigeng ke ditsela tse di reledisang, ditselana tse di riteletsweng (tse di fa thoko ga tsela) le segolobogolo, disetepise. Le fa go twe go padile, o tlhokana le ditlhako tse di nang le bogato jo bo siameng. Ditlhako tsa selemo ga ntsi di a relela mo godimo ga metsi a a gatsetseng le sefako, le tsone ditlhako tse dingwe tsa mariga ga di a siama. flores_passage: "Ditlhaketlhake tsa Cook ke naga ya ditlhaketlhake tse di sa kopaneng ka gope le New Zealand, e e fitlhelwang kwa Polynesia, e e kwa bogareng jwa Borwa jwa Lewatle la Pacific. Ke ditlhopha tsa ditlhaketlhake tse lesome le botlhano tse di anameng bophara le boleele jwa dikhilomitara di le dimilione 2.2 mo lewatleng. E re ka di na le nako e e tshwanang le ya Hawaii, ditlhaketlhake tse ka nako tse dingwe di tsewa e le ""Hawaii ke Australia le New Zealand"". Le fa e le nnye, e gakolola baeti bangwe ba bagodi ka fa Hawaii e neng e le ka teng pele a nna leloko la Amerika - go se na dihotele tse ditona tsa bajanala le ditlhabologo tse dingwe. Ditlhaketlhake tsa Cook ga di na toropo dipe mme di dirilwe ka ditlhaketlhake di le 15 tse di farologaneng. Ditlhaketlhake tsa konokono ke Rarotonga le Aitukaki."
question: Ke efe ya tse di latelang, e e tshwanang sentle magareng ga Hawaii le Setlhaketlhake sa Cook?
mc_answer1: Bobedi jwa tsone, di na le dihotele di le dintsi, tse ditona
mc_answer2: Bobedi jwa tsone, ga se leloko la Amerika
mc_answer3: Di na le nako e e tshwanang
mc_answer4: Bobedi jwa tsone ga bo na ditoropo

flores_passage: Tetlelelo e tshwanetswe ya kopiwa nako e sale teng. O tshwanetse wa bo o na le tetlelelo ya go lala kwa Sirena. Sirena ke yone fela lefelo la batlhokomedi ba paraka le le neelanang ka lefelo la boroko le dijo tse di bolelo mo godimo ga go kampa. La Leona, San Pedrillo, le Los Patos tsone di neelana fala ka go kampa go sena dijo. Go a kgonagala go bona teseletso ya phaka gotswa go mannong a batlhokomedi kwa Puerto Jiménez, mme ga ba tseye dikarata tsa madi. Ba Tirelo ya Diparaka (MINAE) ga ba neelane ka ditetlelelo tsa paraka ka sebaka sa kgwedi e le nngwe go sale gale ka nako e go goroga go lebeletsweng ka yone. CafeNet El Sol e neelana ka tirelo e e beeleditsweng ka didolara tsa Amerika di le masome a mararo, US$30, kgotsa di le lesome, $10 ya go tsena ya letsatsi lotlhe. Dintlha ka botlalo di mo letlakaleng la webosaete ya bone ya Corcovado.

flores_passage: Go skiya ka mesobana: Se gape se bidiwa go skiya mo sekgweng, go skiya ga bojanala, kgotsa go skiya ga go palama dithaba. Ke sika loo alpine skiing kgotsa moutaineering le fa tota e se selo se le sengwe, tse di dirwang go tswa kwa godimodimo mme e bile go tlhoka ditlhako le didirisiwa tse di itsetsepetseng thata. Akanya fela ka tselana ya go relela mo kapokong e le e tshwanang fela le tselana ya go haeka. Mo seemong se se siameng o tla kgona go tsamaya sekgela se se leele ka maoto - mme ke ka sewelo o ka bonang mabelo a go ralala naga a go relela mo kapokong ntle le sekgwama se se bokete se se belegwang mo ditselaneng tse di gorutsweng.

mc_answer1: Go skiya ga go palama dithaba

flores_passage: Go bowa o tlwaela botshelo jwa kwa gaeno o sena go nna kwa lefatsheng le sele go tla ka bonako go feta ka fa o angwang ke go tlwaela botshelo le ditso tsa lefatshe le sele. Batsamai ba ba amogelang ngwao le botshelo jwa lefathe le sele motlhofo ke bone thatatathata ba a tleng ba sokole go bowa ba tlwaela ngwao ya bone fa ba boela gae. Fa o boela gae o sena go nna kwa mafatsheng a sele, o setse o tlwaetse ngwao e ncha e bile o o latlhile le mekgwa le ngwao ya ga go. Fa o ya moseja la ntlha, batho ba ne ba le pelotelele e bile ba tlhaloganya, ba itse go re batho ba ba tswang kwa ntle ha ba goroga mo lefatsheng le lesha ba tlhoka go le tlwaela. Batho ba ka nna ba se lebelele go re boitshoko le go tlhaloganya le tsone di botlhokwa mo batsamaing ba ba boelang gae.
question: Batsamai ba ba bowang ba tlwaela botshelo jwa ga bo bone ba se na go nna kwa lefatsheng le sele ba kgaratlhela go dira eng?
mc_answer1: Amogela setso sa lefatshe le sele
mc_answer2: O nne le boitshoko le go tlhaloganya
mc_answer4: Go bowa ba tlwaela setso sa bone

flores_passage: Phologolo e e bidiwang moose (e gape e itseweng ka leina la elk) ga e bogale, le fa gone iphemela fa e dumela e gomagomediwa botshelo. Fa batho basa lemoge go re phologolo ya moose e ka nna borai, ba ka e atamela ba se kelotlhoko, ka jalo baya matshelo a bone mo diphatseng.
question: Ke efe ya tse di latelang e batho ba tshwanetseng go efoga go e dira go moose?
mc_answer3: E iphemela fa e dumela e gomagomediwa botshelo

flores_passage: Mo mogoteng wa letsatsi, basepidi ba ka itemogela meuwane e e dirang go re e nne e kete o bona metsi (kgotsa dilo tse dingwe). Se se ka nna borai fa e le go re mosepedi o latelela dilo tse di seyong, a senya maatla le metsi tse di botlhokwa thata tse di setseng. Le sekaka sese bolelo godi feta, se kgona go nna tshididi thata mo bosigong. Go wela mogote wa mmele thata, go a kgonega fa motho a sa apara dilwana tse di bothitho.
question: Go ya ka temana,ke efe ya tse di latelang, ke eng se se ka se nneng borai go baeng ba sekaka?
mc_answer1: Fa motho a sa apara dilwana tse di bothito mo bosigong jo bo tsididi
mc_answer2: Go itemogela meuwane e e dirang ekete o bona metsi
mc_answer3: Go senya maatla fa o latelela dilo tse di seyong
mc_answer4: Go senya metsi fa o latelela dilo tse seyong

flores_passage: Rephaboliki ya Dominican (ka se-Spain: República Dominicana) ke naga ya Caribbean e e fitlhelwang kwa sephatlong sa botlhaba jwa setlhaketlhake sa Hispaniola, e e e aroganang le Haiti. Ntle le motlhaba o mosweu wa mo letshitshing le lefatshe le le dithaba, naga eno ke legae la toropo ya bogologolo ya Yuropa kwa Amerika, e gompieno e leng karolo ya Santo Domingo. Setlhakatlhake se ne pele se nniwa ke ba-Taino le ba-Caribe. Ba-Caribe e ne e le batho ba puo ya se-Arawakan ba ba gororileng ka mo e ka nnang 10,000 BCE. Mo dingwageng di le mmalwanyana fela morago ga go re babatlisisi ba Yuropa ba goroge, baagi ba ba-Taino ba ne ba fokoditse thata ke bathopi ba ba-Spain. Go ya ka Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) magareng a 1492 le 1498 bathopi ba ba-Spain ba ile ba bolaya ba-Taino ba ka nna 100,000.
question: Go ya ka temana, ke setlhopha sa baagi bafe se se neng se fokodiwe morago ga gore babatlisisi?

flores_passage: "Metshameko ya kapoko, e akaretsang wa go skiya le wa snowboarding, ke metshameko e e ratiwang ya go relelela o tswa kwa go dimo mo thabeng  e e nang le kapoko o ya kwa tlase, o tsentse di-ski kgotsa di-snowboard mo maotong. Go rerela mo kapokong, ke dingwe tsa tse bajanala ba ratang go di dira tota. Go na le batho ba ba ratang motshameko wa teng mo go feteletseng, ba ba etleng ba bidiwe ”ski bums”, ba ba kgonang go rulaganya nako yotlhe ya maikhutso mo lefelong la go relela mo kapokong. Go ijesa monate o itheledia mo kapokong mo ka puo ya seeng go tweng ""skiing"" go tswa kgakala thata - go na le botaki jo bo supang batho ba dira jalo ka 5000 BC! Motshameko wa go skiya, o simolotse mo dingwageng tsa bo 18-- bogologolo. Ka ngwaga wa 1861 ma-Norweigan mangwe ba ne ba bula lefelo lwa ntlha la itlosa boduto la go skiya kwa Australia."

flores_passage: Ditlhaketlhake tsa Botlhabatsatsi jwa Afrika di mo Lewatleng la Indian Ocean. Madagascar ke yone e kgolo mo go tsone tsotlhe, mme e bile go ka twe ke kontinente e e ikemetseng ka nosi fa go lebilwe diphologolo tsa naga. Bontsi jwa ditlhakatlhake tse dinnye di ikemetse ka nosi, kgotsa di amana le lefatshe la Fora, gape di itsege e le mafelo a go iketla a maemo a kwa godimo. Ma-Arabea gape ba tlisitse tumelo ya Islam ko mafelong a, e bo e jwalelela thata ko Comoros le Mayotte. Ditsamaiso tsa serodumo sa se-Yuropa le bokolone di simologile mo dingwageng tsa bo 14--, fa mosasankegi wa moPotokisi, Vasco da Gama, a fitlhelela tsela e e ralelang Kapa, go tswa Yuropa, go ya Intia.
question: Ke sefe sa tse di latelang, se, ka tlwaelo,se golagangwang le setlhaketlhake se segolo go feta lewatle la Botlhabatsatsi jwa Afrika?
mc_answer4: Mafelo a go iketla a maemo a a kwa godimo

Dikereke tsa setso ga ntsi di tshwara Tebelelo ya Paseka bosigo ja Lamatlhatso ka mafelo a beke a Paseka, ka phuthego e keteka ka bosigogare go itumelela tsogo ya ga Keresete.

flores_passage: Ecuador e batla gore baagi ba Cuba ba amogele lekwalo la taletso pele ba tsena mo Ecuador ka maemafofane a boditšhabatšhaba kgotsa mafelo a kamogelo a melelwane. Lekwalo leno le tshwanetse go letlelelwa semolao ke ba Lephata la Merero ya Batswantle la Ecuador, le be le fitlhelela ditlhokego tse di rileng. Ditlhokego tse di diretswe go neelana ka tshedimosetso ya tsa bofudugelo magareng ga dinaga tse pedi. Baagi ba Cuba ba ba nang le karata e tala ya US ba tshwanetse go etela Kantoro ya Boemedi ya Ecuador go re ba seka ba amiwa ke tlhokego eno. Lekwalo la ga go la mosepele le tshwanetse ya bo la bo letlelesegile ka dikgwedi di le 6 ka kwa ga letlha la mosepele. Tekete ya leeto la go ya le go boatla selegae le a tlhokega go supa go re o tsile go nna lobaka lo lo kae.
question: Gore ba seka ba amiwa ke tlhokego eno fa o tsena ka Ecuador,moagi wa Cuba o tshwanetse a nne le eng pele?
mc_answer1: Lekwalo la mosepele le tshwanetse ya bo le letlesegile ka dikgwedi di le 6 ka kwa ga letlha la mosepele
mc_answer2: Lekwalo la taletso le le letleletsweng semolao
mc_answer3: Tekete ya leeto la go ya le go boa e tlhokega go supa gore o tsile go nna lobaka lo lo kae

flores_passage: Ecuador e batla gore baagi ba Cuba ba amogele lekwalo la taletso pele ba tsena mo Ecuador ka maemafofane a boditšhabatšhaba kgotsa mafelo a kamogelo a melelwane. Lekwalo leno le tshwanetse go letlelelwa semolao ke ba Lephata la Merero ya Batswantle la Ecuador, le be le fitlhelela ditlhokego tse di rileng. Ditlhokego tse di diretswe go neelana ka tshedimosetso ya tsa bofudugelo magareng ga dinaga tse pedi. Baagi ba Cuba ba ba nang le karata e tala ya US ba tshwanetse go etela Kantoro ya Boemedi ya Ecuador go re ba seka ba amiwa ke tlhokego eno. Lekwalo la ga go la mosepele le tshwanetse ya bo la bo letlelesegile ka dikgwedi di le 6 ka kwa ga letlha la mosepele. Tekete ya leeto la go ya le go boatla selegae le a tlhokega go supa go re o tsile go nna lobaka lo lo kae.
question: Ditlhokego tsa Ecuador tsa mosepele ga di a direlwa eng?
mc_answer1: Go tshola palo ya baeng e le kwa tlase
mc_answer2: Go neelana ka tshedimosetso ya tsa bofudugelo magareng ga dinaga tse pedi
mc_answer3: Go supa gore moeng o tsile go nna lobaka lo lo kae
mc_answer4: Lekwalo la gago la mosepele le tshwanetse la bo le letlelesegile

flores_passage: Digalase tsa matlho kwa dinageng di sele di kgona go nna tlhwatlhwa-tlase, segolo jang kwa dinageng tse di duelang lotseno lo lo nnye koo ditshenyegelo tsa badiri di leng kwa tlase. Akanyetsa go tlhatlhobelwa matlho kwa lapeng, bogolo jang fa o na le itshireletso ya bongaka, o bo o tla le lekwalo la ngaka la melemo go re le bolokiwe go sele. Diforeime tsa maemo fa di bonala mo mafelonga a ntseng jalo go ka nna le mathata a mabedi ; ga se tsa nnete, gape tsa nnete di tura go feta kwa di tswang gone.
question: Ke efe ya tse di latelang e e ka nnang tlhwatlhwa- godimo kwa nageng e sele go na le kwa lapeng?
mc_answer4: Diforeimi tse tse e seng tsa maemo

flores_passage: Digalase tsa matlho kwa dinageng di sele di kgona go nna tlhwatlhwa-tlase, segolo jang kwa dinageng tse di duelang lotseno lo lo nnye koo ditshenyegelo tsa badiri di leng kwa tlase. Akanyetsa go tlhatlhobelwa matlho kwa lapeng, bogolo jang fa o na le itshireletso ya bongaka, o bo o tla le lekwalo la ngaka la melemo go re le bolokiwe go sele. Diforeime tsa maemo fa di bonala mo mafelonga a ntseng jalo go ka nna le mathata a mabedi ; ga se tsa nnete, gape tsa nnete di tura go feta kwa di tswang gone.
question: Ke eng se se ka nnang le matshosetsi ka go reka diforeimi tsa maemo mo nageng e sele?
mc_answer1: Tlhatlhobo e nngwe ya matlho e ka nne ya tlhokega
mc_answer2: Lekwalo la ngaka la melemo le ka nne la se letlelesege mo diforeiming tse dingwe
mc_answer3: Di ka nne di a se nne tsa nnete
mc_answer4: Itshireletso ya bongaka e ka nne ya se duele ditshenyegelo

flores_passage: Ledi la semmuso la kwa Falklamds ke ponto ya Falkland e leng (FKP) le boleng ba lone bo lekanyetswang le ponto ya Boritane (GBP). Thekololo ya madi e diragala fela mo bankeng ele ngwe mo dikakeng tse, banka e, e bonwa kwa Stanley, go lebagana le lebenkele la FIC West. Diponto tsa Borithane go le ga ntsi di amogelwa gongwe le gongwe mo ditlhaketlhakeng le mo dikarateng tsa molato tsa Stanley mme le didolara tsa United States le tsone ga ntsi di a amogelwa. Mo ditlhaketlhakeng tse di ikadileng mo mafelelong dikarata tsa molato go ka direga di seka tsa amogelwa, le fa gone madi a Borithane le United States a ka nna a tsewa; tlhola le beng ba lefelo go sale gale go utlwa go re ke mofuta ofe wa tuelo o o amogelwang. Go batla go sa kgonege gotlhelele go ananya madi a Falklands ka kwa ntle ga setlhaketlhake se, ka jalo ananya madi pele o tswa mo setlhakatlhakeng.
question: Tebang le tiriso ya ledi kwa Falklands, ke efe ya dipolelo tse di latelang e e leng nnete?
mc_answer1: Go amogelwa fela dikarata tsa molato le diponto tsa Boritane (GBP) , mo ditlhaketlhakeng tse di ikadileng mo mafelelong
mc_answer2: Stanley ke lone fela lefelo le le tla amogelang didolara tsa United States
mc_answer3: Diponto tsa Falkland di tshwanetse go ananywa morago ga go tswa mo ditlhakatlhakeng
mc_answer4: Kwa ntle ga ponto ya Falkland , ponto ya Boritane, go le gantsi, e amogelwa gongwe le gongwe

flores_passage: Bontsi jwa ditempele di na le moletlo wa Ngwaga le Ngwaga o o simololang fa Ngwanatsele a fela go fitlha Motsheganong ele fa gare, mme e farologana go ya ka khalendara ya ngwaga ya tempele nngwe le nngwe. Bontsi jwa meletlo ya tempele bo dirwa ele bontlhabongwe jwa segopotso sa tempele, letsatsi la matsalo la modingwana yo ka nako eo a ikametseng tempele kgotsa moletlo mongwe le mongwe fela o o amanang le tempele. Meletlo ya ditempele tsa Kerala e kgatlha fela thata, go etle go bonagale gape le ditlou tsedi kgabisitsweng, baopedi ba kereke letse dingwe.
question: Ke moletlo ofe o o sa golaganang le go dirwa ga meletlo ya tempele?
mc_answer4: Meletlo e megolo e e amanang le tempele

flores_passage: Bontsi jwa ditempele di na le moletlo wa Ngwaga le Ngwaga o o simololang fa Ngwanatsele a fela go fitlha Motsheganong ele fa gare, mme e farologana go ya ka khalendara ya ngwaga ya tempele nngwe le nngwe. Meletlo ya ditempele tsa Kerala e kgatlha fela thata, go etle go bonagale gape le ditlou tsedi kgabisitsweng, baopedi ba kereke letse dingwe.
question: Ke kae moo ditlou tse di kgabisitsweng di ka bonwang teng?
mc_answer1: Gongwe le gongwe, go tswa bokhutlong jwa Ngwanatsele, go fitlha Motsheganong e le fa gare
mc_answer3: Go a tle go bonale le ditlou tse di kgabisitsweng

flores_passage: Tsela e mo pepeneneng ya go fofa ka sefofane sa maemo a ntlha kgotsa sa maemo a kwa godimo ke go duela madi a mantsi thata go bona maemo ao (kgotsa, botoka, kopa ba setheo sa ga go go go duelela). Mme fela, se se a tura: go tlwaelesegile go re o ka duela selekanyo sa bontsi ga ne go gaisa tuelo ya tlwaelo, fa o dirisa karolo ya tsa bakgwebi, le bontsi ga some le bongwe go karolong ya maemo a ntlha. Fa re buwa fela, ga gona mosola wa go re o leke go fokolediwa tlhwatlhwa fa o le mo karolong ya kgwebo, kgotsa ya maemo a ntlha, mo sefofaneng se se tlhamalelang go tswa lefelo A go ya B. Ba ditheo tsa difofane ba itse sentle go re go na le setlhopha sengwe sa bafofi se se ikeetleditseng go duela madi a mantsi go bona tshiamelo ya go ya sepela ka bonako ba sosologile; ka jalo ba ba batla dituelo tse di maleba.
question: Go ya ka temana,ke mekgwa efe ya e e latelang, ya go fokolediwa tlhwatlhwa mo karolong ya tsa bagwebi kgotsa ya maemo a ntlha?
mc_answer1: Kopa ba setheo sa gago go go duelela
mc_answer2: Fa o dirisa karolo ya maemo a ntlha go na le ya tsa bagwebi
mc_answer3: Go dirisa sefofane se se sa tlhamalalang sa maemo a ntlha

question: Go ya ka temana, ke eng se go ka se nneng mosola go se batla fa o batla go dirisa dikarolo tse di rileng tsa sefofane?

flores_passage: Difofane tse di tshwanang le bo Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines di okeditse ditirelo tsa tsone ko Aforika, e bile di neelana ka dikgokagano go ya ditoropong tse dintsi tse dikgolo tsa Aforika ka ditlhwatlhwa tse di siameng go na le difofane tsa Yuropa. Difofane tsa kwa Turkish Airlines di fofela mafelong a le 39 mo dinageng tse 30 tsa Aforika fa e sale ka 2014. Fa o na le nako e e oketsegileng ya go tsamaya, tlhola go bona gore palogotlhe ya madi a go ya Afrika ke bokae fa o e bapisa le madi a go ralala lefatshe. O seka wa lebala go tsenyeletsa ditshenyegelelo tse di okeditsweng ke dibukana tse dingwe tsa mesepele, makgetho a mesepele, sepalamo jalo jalo. gotlhe ko go etelwang teng ko ntle ga Afrika.
question: Ke eng se se sa tlhokeng go tsenngwa fa o bapisa palogotlhe ya go ya Aforika le madi a go ralala lefatshe?
mc_answer1: Ditshenyegelo tse di okeditsweng ke dibukana tse dingwe tsa mesepele ko ntle ga Aforika
mc_answer2: Ditshenyegelo tsa makgetho a mesepele mo Aforika
mc_answer3: Ditshenyegelo tsa makwalo a mosepele a Aforika
mc_answer4: Ditshenyegelo tsa dipalangwa tsa mafelo a a leng kwa ntle ga Aforika

flores_passage: Ga ntsi go reka dijo mo marekisetsong ke tsela e e sa lopeng madi a mantsi ya go bona dijo. Le fa go ntse jalo, ntle le sebaka sa go apaya, o ka ikaega ka dijo tse di apeetsweng ruri. Marekisetso a simolotse go oketsa le go kabakanya dijo tse di apeetsweng ruri. Dingwe tsa tsone e bile di na le di-microwave le methale e mengwe ya go thuthafatsa dijo. Mafatshe mangwe kgotsa mabenkele a a haphegileng a na le marekisetso a dijo gautshwanyane, go le ga ntsi e le a a iketlileng e bile dijo tsa teng di sa ture.
question: Go ya ka temana,ke eng se marekisetso a simolotseng go se kabakanya?

flores_passage: Ga ntsi go reka dijo mo marekisetsong ke tsela e e sa lopeng madi a mantsi ya go bona dijo. Le fa go ntse jalo, ntle le sebaka sa go apaya, o ka ikaega ka dijo tse di apeetsweng ruri. question: Ke eng se se tlamelwang ke marekisetso a mangwe, se se ka kgatlhang bareki ba dijo tse di apeetsweng ruri?
mc_answer2: Dijo tse di sa kabakangwang thata

flores_passage: Mefuta e farologanyeng ya Sefora se se buiwang kwa Belgium le Switzerland e farologana go se nene le se se buiwang kwa France, le fa gone e na le ha e tshwanang teng mo o ka e tlhaloganyang yoo mebedi. Segolobogolo, thulaganyo ya dinomore ya Sefora sa Belgium le Switzerland e harologana go go le gonnye le Sefora se se buiwang kwa Fora, mme le ka fa ba bitsang mafoko mangwe ka teng go farologana go le gonnye. Le fa go ntse jalo, batho botlhe ba Belgium le Switzerland ba ithutile Sefora se se tlwaelesegileng kwa sekolong, ka jalo ba ka kgona go go tlhaloganya le fa o dirisa mokgwa o o tlwaelesegileng wa go bala ka Sefora.
question: Ke sefe sa tse di latelang tse di ka nneng di a se tlhaloganngwe ke ba-Belgium le ba- Switzerland ba ba buang Sefora?
mc_answer2: E farologana le Sefora se se buiwang kwa Fora
mc_answer3: Ka fa ba bitsang mafoko mangwe ka teng
mc_answer4: Sefora se se buiwang gantsi kwa Fora

flores_passage: Mefuta e farologanyeng ya Sefora se se buiwang kwa Belgium le Switzerland e farologana go se nene le se se buiwang kwa France, le fa gone e na le ha e tshwanang teng mo o ka e tlhaloganyang yoo mebedi. Segolobogolo, thulaganyo ya dinomore ya Sefora sa Belgium le Switzerland e harologana go go le gonnye le Sefora se se buiwang kwa Fora, mme le ka fa ba bitsang mafoko mangwe ka teng go farologana go le gonnye. Le fa go ntse jalo, batho botlhe ba Belgium le Switzerland ba ithutile Sefora se se tlwaelesegileng kwa sekolong, ka jalo ba ka kgona go go tlhaloganya le fa o dirisa mokgwa o o tlwaelesegileng wa go bala ka Sefora.
question: Ke eng sa tse di latelang se se farologaneng kwa France jaaka se le mo Belgium le Switzerland?
mc_answer1: Ka fa mafoko otlhe a bitswang ka teng
mc_answer3: Sefora se se tlwaelesegileng kwa sekolong
mc_answer4: Ka fa go kwalwang mafoko a mangwe a Sefora

flores_passage: Ke difofane di le mmalwanyana tse di sentseng di duedisa bapagami ba ba yang diphitlhong ka tshoganyetso, ditlhwatlhwa tse di fokoditsweng go le sekae. Ditlamo tsa difofane tse di neelanang ka se di akaretsa Air Canada, Delta Airlines, le Lufthansa mo difofaneng tse di emelelang go tsa kwa Amerika le Canada, le WestJet. Mo maemong otlhe, o tshwanetse go tsenya kopo ka mogala ka tlhamalalo kwa difofaneng.
question: Ke mo maemong afe moo o ka se neelweng ditlhwatlhwa tse di fokoditsweng go le sekae fa o ya phitlhong ya tshoganyetso?
mc_answer1: Fa o dirisa setlamo sa difofane sa WestJet
mc_answer2: Fa o leka go tsenya kopo ka tlhamalalo kwa difofaneng go na le go dirisa motlamedi o mongwe wa ditirelo
mc_answer3: Fa o fofa ka Lufthansa go tswa Paris go ya United States

flores_passage: Ke difofane di le mmalwanyana tse di sentseng di duedisa bapagami ba ba yang diphitlhong ka tshoganyetso, ditlhwatlhwa tse di fokoditsweng go le sekae. question: Ke eng se e leng nnete ka ditlhwatlhwa tsa go ya diphitlhong ka tshoganyetso?
mc_answer1: Di duela ditlhwatlhwa tsa bapagami ba ba yang diphitlhong ka tshoganyetso
mc_answer2: O tshwanetse go tsenya kopo ka tlhamalalo mo webosaeteng ya ditlamo tsa difofane
mc_answer3: Ba duelela go fofa ga tshoganyetso
mc_answer4: O tshwanetse go tsenya kopo ka mogala ka tlhamalalo kwa difofaneng

flores_passage: Go dirisa ditiriso tsa GPS tsa go supa tsela mo mogaleng wa ga go wa letheka go ka nna motlhofo e bile e le tsela e botoka le go feta ya go supa tsela fa o tswetse kwa ntle ga lefatshe la gaeno. E kgona go babalela madi go na le go reka di mmepe tsa GPS tse disha, kana GPS e e ikemetseng ka nosi kana go e hira kwa dikhampaning tsa go hirisa dikoloi. Fa o sena kgolagano ya inthanete mo mogaleng wa ga go, kana fa go sena neteweke, tiragatso ya tsone e ka nna ya lekanyediwa kgotsa ya seka ya nna teng.
question: Ke neng fa tiriso ya GPS e e ikemetseng ka nosi e leng botoka le go feta ditiriso tsa GPS tsa go supa tsela mo mogaleng wa gago wa letheka?
mc_answer1: Fa o leka go babalela madi
mc_answer2: Fa o tlhomamisitse gore o tsile go nna le kgolagano ya inthanete
mc_answer4: Fa o sa batle go hira tiriso

mc_answer1: Go sa tlhoke go tshwenyega ka kgolagano ya inthanete
mc_answer4: Go sa tlhoke go reka di mmepe tse diša

flores_passage: Go bona mafelo le diphologolo tsa naga tsa Galapagos go bonala botoka go gaisa fa o dirisa mokoro, fela jaaka Charles Darwin a ile a dira ka 1835. Dikepe tse dikgolo tsa loeto lwa go ijesa monate di ka nna 60 di tsamaya ka metlha kwa Galapagos – go tswa go selekanyo sa bapalami ba le 8 go ya go ba le 100. Bontsi jwa batho ba kopa ba ipeela sebaka go sale gale thata (e re ka dikepe ga ntsi di tlala ka paka ya fa di palangwa thata). Netefatsa gore modiredii yo o bukang mo go ene ke moitsaanape wa Galapagos yo o nang le kitso e e tseneletseng ka mefuta ya dikepe tse di farologaneng. Se se tla netefatsa go re dikeletso tsa ga go lekana dikgwetlho ka go kgethega di nyalanywa le sekepe se se a tshwanelang.
question: Go ya ka temana, o ka netefatsa jang gore o nyalanngwa le sekepe se se maleba?
mc_answer1: Go ipeela sebaka sa setlhopha sa bapagami ba le 8+, ba dikeletso tse di tshwanang
mc_answer2: Go ipeela sebaka sa paka ya fa di sa palangwe thata
mc_answer3: Buka le modiredi yo e leng moitseanape wa maeto a Galapagos
mc_answer4: Go ipeela sebaka go sa le gale thata

flores_passage: Mafelo a itloso boduto a casino, a dirisa metlhale e mentsi go dira go re bareki ba nne nako e ntsi mo teng. Gantsi ga gona matlhabaphefo le tshupanako, le mabati a go tswa ga a bonale bonolo. Gantsi ba na le dijo tse di kgethegileng, dino le tse di tlosang bodutu, go baya baeng mo maikutlong a monate, le go ba itsa go tsamaya. Mafelo magwe a naya bojalwa jwa mahala. Mme le gale, go tagiwa go thibela go akanya sentle, ka jalo, mme bomankge botlhe ba go becha ba itsi bomosola jwa go sa tagiwa.

mc_answer2: Ditlhotlheletso di tshwana le dikarata tsa mahala tsa konsarata

mc_answer4: Go botsa ka mabati a a gaufi a go tswa

flores_passage: "Mo dintlheng di le dintsi tsa lefatshe, go laela ka letsogo ke tsela ya botsalano ya go ""dumedisa."" Mme gone, kwa Malaysia, bobotlana mo go ba letso lwa Ba-Malay kwa magaeng, go raya go re ""tla kwano,"" go tshwana le monwana wa bosupa o lebile mo mmeleng, letshwao le le dirisiwang mo dinageng dingwe tsa Bophirima, mme le tshwanetse go dirisiwa fela jone boikaelelo joo. Ka mo go tshwanang, mosepedi wa moBorithane kwa Spain a ka dira phoso ka go akanya go re go tsholetsa letsogo fa o sadisa sentle ka seatla se lebile motho yo o go sadisang sentle, (e seng yo o sadisiwang sentle) e le sesupo sa go re boela kwano."
question: Kwa magaeng a kwa Malaysia, ke letshwao le feng le le rayang gore “tlaa kwano”?
mc_answer1: monwana wa bosupa o lebile mo mmeleng
mc_answer2: Tsholetsa letsogo fa o sadisa sentle
mc_answer3: Go itaana legofi ka legofi, le tsholeditse diatla
mc_answer4: Go emisa menwana e megolo ya diatla ka bobedi

mc_answer1: Go tsholetsa letsogo ka seatla se go lebile
mc_answer3: Go tsholetsa letsogo ka seatla se lebile motho yo o mo sadisang sentle

flores_passage: Kgatselo e e tsamayang ga e a itshetlela, mme e elela mo thabeng. Se se kgona go dira go re marogo a kapoko a bipege a bo a sa bonale. Mabota a magaga a metsi a a gatsetseng a kgona go phutlhama, ebile diphatlha tsa teng di kgona go tswalaga. Ko dithokong tsa kgatselo e, kgatselo tse di tona tla bo di robega, di wela fa fatshe kana di tlola kana di kgokologa go tswa mo matlhakoreng.
question: Go ya ka temana, ke eng se se dirileng gore go nne le diphatlha tse di bipilweng ke marogo?
mc_answer2: Kgatselo tse ditona di tlabe di kgokologa go tswa mo matlhakoreng
mc_answer3: Mabota a magaga a metsi a a gatsetseng a kgona go phutlhama
mc_answer4: Kgatselo tse di tona tla bo di robega

flores_passage: Goma ke teropo ya bojanala ya lefatshe lwa Democratic Republic of Congo, kwa bofelelong jwa botlhabatsatsi go bapa le lefatshe lwa Rwanda. Ka ngwaga wa 2002 lefelo la Goma le ne la senngwa ke seretse se se elelang gotswa mo lekgwamolelong la kwa Nyirango le le neng la apesa mebila ya toropo, segolobogolo mo bogareng jwa toropo. Le fa Goma e sireletsegile, mesepele epe kwa ntle ga Goma e tshwanetse go batlisisiwe pele ka yone go tlhaloganya seemo jwa ntwa e e tswelelang mo kgaolong ya Kivu Bokone. Toropo eo ke lefelo la go pagamela thaba ya Nyiragogo; le nngwe ya mesepele ya go lepa di-gorilla tsa dithaba e e tlhwatlhwa-tlase mo Afrika. O ka dirisa boda-boda (taxi ya sekuta) go tsamaya mo Goma. Tlhwatlwa ya ka gale (tsa mo gae) ke~500 Congolese Franc fa o tsaya leoto le lekhutshwane.
question: Go ya ka temana,basepedi ba tshwanetse ba batlisise pele ka seemo sa lefelo lefe?
mc_answer2: Mafelo a kwa ntle ga Goma

mc_answer1: Dintwa tsa kwa North Kivu di tlosa bodutu

mc_answer3: Dithekesi tsa sekuta ke tsela e e siameng ya go tsamaya
mc_answer4: Lekgwamolemo la kwa Nyiragongo le ne la apesa toropo

flores_passage: Go kampa kwa lefelong le le kgakajana le Grand Canyon o tlhoka teseletso. Palo diteseletso ga e ntsi thata ka maiteko a go sireletsa legope, mme di nna teng fela ka letsatsi la ntlha la kgwedi, dikgwedi tse 4 pele ga kgwedi ya go simololwa. Ka jalo, tetla ya go kampa gope fela mo mafelong ao e simololang ka Motsheganong e nna teng ka di-1 tsa Ferikgong. Ka gale, dikopo tsa mafelo a a rategang thata a tshwana le Bright Angel Campground le le mabapi le Phantom Ranch, a tlala ka bonako ka tsatsi la ntlha le le buletsweng dikopo tsa peeletso. Go na le palo e e lekantsweng ya diteseletso ya ba ba tsenang fela, mme ba tla thusiwa go ya ka go re go tsile mang pele.
question: Teseletso ya go kampa kwa lefelong le le kgakajana, ya letsatsi la ntlha la Phatwe e tsile go nna teng neng?

question: Ke pholisi efe e e beilweng go sireletsa legope?
mc_answer1: Ba tla thusiwa go ya ka gore go tsile mang pele
mc_answer2: Diteseletso di nna teng fela ka 1 tsa Ferikgong
mc_answer3: Ditetla di bonwa fela ka dikopo tsa go tsena fela o tsamaya ka dinao
mc_answer4: Palo ya ditetla ga e ntsi thata

flores_passage: Di-hotele tse dingwe di na le ditso tsa go tsweng ko nakong ya letlepu, ya go sentse go dirisiwa diterena le dikepe tsa mosi wa metsi; pele ga ntwa ya lefatshe ya bobedi, mo dingwageng tsa bo-18, le tsa bo-19 di simologa. Diotela tse ke kwa go tsone go neng go nna bahumi le batho ba ba itsegeng thata ba nako eo, mme e bile go le ga ntsi di rekisa dijo tsa maemo a a kwa godimo gape di na le mafelo a maitiso a a haphegileng. Mekgabisa ya bogologolo, letlhoko la ditlamelo tsa sesha, le go bo e le tsa dinako tsele tsotlhe ke dingwe tsa dilo tse di dirang go re di nne dintle le go feta. E re ntswa ka gale e le tsa beng, di a tle di dirisiwe ke baeteledipele le batlotlegi ba bangwe. Mojanala yo o nang le madi a sisimosang o ka sekaseka go dikologa lefatshe a ijesa monate, a eta a ikhutsa ka go etela bontsi kwa diotela tseno.
question: Ke efe ya tse di latelang, e e ka se tsogeng e bonwe kwa mefuteng ya dihotele tse di tlhalositsweng mo temaneng?
mc_answer1: Bara ya nnotagi e e tswakantsweng le dilo dingwe
mc_answer2: Direseturente tsa maemo a a kwa godimo
mc_answer3: Go ne go nna bahumi le batho ba ba itsegeng thata ba nako eo
mc_answer4: Diphaposi tse di ntšhafaditsweng sešeng jaana ka ditlhabololo tsa segompieno

question: Go ya ka tshedimosetso e e tlhagisitsweng mo temaneng ke efe ya tse di neelwang mo hoteleng, tse bajanala ba ka se di tseyeng tsia?
mc_answer2: Marekisetso a bojelo ka moapei yo o tlhomogileng
mc_answer3: Mafelo a maitiso a a ntshang bodutu
mc_answer4: Dituelo tsa boroko tse di tlhwatlhwa-tlase

flores_passage: "Ke lebogela ba metlhale ya fibre ya ka fa tlase ga lewatle e kopanyang Europe le disatalaete tsa broadband, lefatshe la Greenland le gokegetswe sentle ka bokete jwa dipercente di le masome a borobabongwe le boraro tsa batho b aba nang le maranyane a internete. Otela kgotsa beng ba kwa o gorogetseng teng (fa o gorogetse kwa guesthouseng kgotsa ntlong ya mong) e tla a bo e na le maranyane a WiFi kgotsa khomputara e e gokeletsweng maranyane a enthanete, mme mafelo otlhe a na le fa o ka duelang go dirisa enthanete kgotsa mafelo a sechaba a letlang tiriso ya enthanete mahala. Jaaka go setse go boletswe, e re ntswa lefoko ""Eskimo"" le santse le amogelesega kwa Amerika, go dumelwa fa le kgopisa ba le bantsi ba e seng batho ba Amerika ba ba nnang kwa kapokong ya Artic, bogolobogolo jang ba Canada. Le fa o ka utlwa lefoko leo le dirisiwa ke batho ba Greenland, ga le a tshwanela ke go dirisiwa ke batswakwa. Banni ba sekei ba lefatshe la Greenland ba ipitsa Ma-Inuit kwa Canada le Kalaalleq (fa ba le bantsi Kalaallit), mme ba ipitsa ma-Greenland kwa Greenland. Bokebekwa, le go ilwa ga batswantle ka kakaretso, ga go itsagale gotlhe gotlhe kwa Greenland. Tota le e leng mo ditoropong, ga go na ""mafelo a a kotsi."" Maemo a bosa a a tsididi ke nngwe ya diphatsa tsa nnete tse ba ba sa ipaakanyang batla itemogela tsone. Fa o etela lefatshe la Greenland ka paka ya mariga (gakologelwa gore fa o ntse o tsamaela bokone, go nna tsididi le go feta), go botlhokwa go tsamaya ka diaparo tse di bothitho tse dintsi. Malatsi a a maleele a selemo a ka dira go re go nne le mathata a go robala sentle le mathata a botsogo a a amanang le gone. Fa go le selemo, o ele tlhoko monang o bidiwang ”Nordic”. Le ntswa o sa tshele bolweetse bope, o ngomola pelo."
question: Go ya ka temana, ke eng se basepedi ba ba etelang Greenland ba tshwanetseng go se tila?
mc_answer1: Mafelo a mangwe a a itsegeng ka bokebekwa jo bo kwa godimo
mc_answer2: Go tsamaya ka diaparo tse di bothitho tse dintsi, ka phetogo ya loapi, ka tlwaelo, e le bothito ngwaga otlhe
mc_answer3: Lebeletse go dira fa ke le koo, ka kgokelelo ya maranyane a enthanete e na le go kgaoga
mc_answer4: Go bitsa motho yo o tlholegang kwa Greenland le“Eskimo”

flores_passage: Jardin de la Unión. Sebaka seno se ne sa agiwa go nna holo ya baitlami mo lekgolong la bo-17 la dingwaga, e ga jaana Templo de San Diego e leng yone fela kago e e santseng e le gone. Ga jaana e dirisiwa jaaka marekelo a konokono, mme e nna e na le dilo di le dintsi tse di diragalang mo go yone, motshegare le bosigo. Go nale mafelo a le mantsi a go ja a a dikaganyeditseng tshingwana, e bile ka thapama le maitseboa ditiragatso koo gantsi di direrelwa ka fa tlase ga moriti wa sekgele. Callejon del Beso (Mogogoro wa Tladimothwana). Mathudi a le mabedi a a kgaogantsweng ke disenthimithara di le 69 fela ke legae la mogaka wa bogologolo wa marato. Ka dipeni di le mmalwanyana fela bana bangwe ba ka go tlotlela kgang ya teng.
question: Ke efe ya tse di latelang e e ga jaana e diriswang jaaka marekelo a konokono?

question: Go ya ka temana, ke efe ya tse di latelang, e e sa bonweng mo Jardín de la Unión?
mc_answer1: Tiragatso ya konsarata ka fa tlase ga moriti wa sekgele
mc_answer2: Legae la mogaka wa bogologolo wa marato
mc_answer3: Mafelo a go ja a a dikanyeditseng tshingwana

flores_passage: Go pagama dithaba ke nngwe ya dilo tse o direlang kwa ntle tse di akaretsang go tsamaya mo ditikologong tsa tlhago, go le ga ntsi mo ditselaneng tsa teng. Go haeka go akaretsa sekgala se se kwa tlase ga mmaele go ya go sekgala se se leele se se ka dirwang mo letsatsing le le nosi. Go palama dithaba ga letsatsi le le lengwe, ga go tlhoke gore motho a ipaakanye thata, ebile mongwe le mongwe a ka kgona a itumelela se. Malapa a a nang le bana ba ba nnye a ka tlhoka dipaakanyo tse di oketsegileng, mme go nna letsatsi kwa ntle go kgonega motlhofo le e leng ka masea le bana ba khereche.
question: Go ya ka temana,ke dife tsa dipolelo tse di latelang ka go palama dithaba ga letsatsi le le lengwe, tse di tsewang di sa nepagala?
mc_answer1: Ga go tlhoke gore motho a ipaakanye thata go palama dithaba ga letsatsi le le lengwe
mc_answer2: Dikgala di a farologana, mme ke tse di ka dirwang mo letsatsing le le lengwe
mc_answer3: Mongwe le mongwe yo o itekanetseng, a ka kgona go itumelela se
mc_answer4: Go palama dithaba go tlhoka dipaakanyo tse di oketsegileng mo malapeng a a nang le bana ba bannye

flores_passage: Go pagama dithaba ke nngwe ya dilo tse o direlang kwa ntle tse di akaretsang go tsamaya mo ditikologong tsa tlhago, go le ga ntsi mo ditselaneng tsa teng. question: Go ya ka temana,ke neng mo go palama dithaba ga letsatsi le le lengwe go sa tlhokeng gore motho a ipaakanye thata?
mc_answer1: Fa mopagami a itekanetse mo mmeleng
mc_answer2: Fa go dirisiwa tsela e e bonolo
mc_answer3: Fa bana ba ya go haeka
mc_answer4: Fa go pagama dithaba go akaretsa go tsamaya mo ditikologong tsa tlhago

flores_passage: "Selo se se tlwaelesegileng ko Norway ke dinokana tse di fa gare ga dithaba, tse di fetogang ka bonako go nna lefelo le le lekalekanang. Dithaba tse ga ntsi di bidiwa ""vidde"", go tewa lefelo le le bulegileng, le sena ditlhare le seageledi. Kwa Rogaland le Agder ka ga ntsi di bidiwa ""hei"" mo go rayang lefelo le le se nang ditlhare le le nnang le apesitswe ke ditlhatshana."
question: Ke eng se se farologaneng ka mafelo a a lekalekanang kwa Rogaland le Agder fa go bapiswa le Norway yotlhe?
mc_answer2: Ga go na dinkana tse di fa gare ga dithaba
mc_answer3: Gantsi ke mafelo a a lekalekanang
mc_answer4: Di nna di apesitswe ke ditlhatshana

mc_answer2: Dithaba tse di nang le ditlhare
mc_answer3: Dinokana tse di fa gare ga dithaba
mc_answer4: Lefelo le le se nang ditlhare

flores_passage: Paka ya bojanala kwa dithabeng, ga ntsi e tlhatloga ka selemo sa se-India. Go tswa go le jalo, bana le bontle jo bo sa tshwaneng le go kgatlhisa ka mariga, le mafelo a dithaba a bonang sefako se se itekanetseng e bile a fana ka metshameko e tshwana le skiing le snowboarding.
question: Bajanala ba ba kgatlhegelang go relela ba tshwanetse go etela lefelo la dithaba neng?
mc_answer2: Ka paka e bojanala bo tlhatlogang

flores_passage: Paka ya bojanala kwa dithabeng, ga ntsi e tlhatloga ka selemo sa se-India. Go tswa go le jalo, bana le bontle jo bo sa tshwaneng le go kgatlhisa ka mariga, le mafelo a dithaba a bonang sefako se se itekanetseng e bile a fana ka metshameko e tshwana le skiing le snowboarding.
question: Go ya ka temana,ke neng fa gantsi go nang le bajanala ba bantsi go gaisa kwa lefelong la dithaba?
mc_answer1: Ka nako ya sefako se se itekanetseng
mc_answer2: Ka paka yotlhe ya go tshamekela mo kapokong

flores_passage: Nna le tshepo ya go re fa o goroga kwa maemelong dikepe sengwe le sengwe se tla a senoga. O tla a rakana le batho ba ba kopang go pegiwa mo dikepeng mme ba tla a amogana dikitso nao. O tla bo o ntsha dikitsiso o naya batho thuso, o tsamaya mo maemakepeng, o atamela batho o phepafatsa dikepe tsa bone, o leka go golagana le batsamaisasekepe mo bareng, jalo le jalo. Leka go bua le batho ba bantsi ka moo go kgonagalang. Morago ga sebaka mongwe le mongwe otla go itse aba a gofa lesedi la gore ke sekepe sefeng se se batlang mongwe.
question: O tshwanetse o efoge go dira eng fa o solofela go bona sekepe se batla thuso?
mc_answer4: Go itlhokomolosa batho ba ba kopang go pegiwa mo dikepeng

flores_passage: Nna le tshepo ya go re fa o goroga kwa maemelong dikepe sengwe le sengwe se tla a senoga. O tla a rakana le batho ba ba kopang go pegiwa mo dikepeng mme ba tla a amogana dikitso nao. O tla bo o ntsha dikitsiso o naya batho thuso, o tsamaya mo maemakepeng, o atamela batho o phepafatsa dikepe tsa bone, o leka go golagana le batsamaisasekepe mo bareng, jalo le jalo. Leka go bua le batho ba bantsi ka moo go kgonagalang. Morago ga sebaka mongwe le mongwe otla go itse aba a gofa lesedi la gore ke sekepe sefeng se se batlang mongwe.
question: O tshwanetse go dira eng kwa maemelong dikepe fa o batlana le sekepe se se tlhokang thuso?
mc_answer3: Bua le batho fela fa ba phephafatsa dikepe tsa bone
mc_answer4: Ikgatholose batho ba ba kopang go pegiwa mo dikepeng

flores_passage: Setlhakatlhake sa Hong Kong ke sone se se fang kgaolo ya Hong Kong leina la yone, e bile ke lefelo le bajanala ba le kayang jaaka la kgogelo. Gomodimo ga mokoloko wa dikago tsa Hong Kong go tshwantshitswe le šhate ya bara e e phatsimang, se se bontshiwa bogolobogolo ke metsi a a fa maemakepe a Victoria. Go re o bone lefelo la Hong kong sentle, tswa mo setlhakatlhakeng seo, o ye kwa lefelong la Kowloon waterfront, le le mabapi. Bontsi jwa dikago tsa setoropo tsa Hong Kong di kgotlhagane mo lefatsheng le le yang kwa ditshitshing tsa bokone. Se ke lefelo le ma-Boritane a pele ba neng ba le ikgapetse. Ka jalo fa o batla go bona ditso tsa sekolone tsa lefatshe le, o ka simolola gone fa.
question: Ke lefelo lefe le le ka ngokang mojanala yo a nang le kgatlhego mo ditsong tsa sekolone tsa lefatshe le?

flores_passage: Mapagamelelo a thusa go tshegetsa maoto a mopagami a lepelelang mo matlhakoreng o o mabedi a pitse. Di tshegetsa mopagami go re a se we mme go ka le matshwenyego a pabalesego ka jaana go kgona go nna thata ya lentswe go ntsha dinao tsa mopagami mo go tsone. Fa mopolami a ka digwa ke pitse lenao la gagwe le santse le tshwerwe ke sale ya pitse, pitse e e kgona go mo gogoula ha hatshe ha e sia. Go na le methale e le mmalwa e e ka dirisiwang go itsa matshosetsi a. Sa ntlha, bontsi jwa bapalami ba rwala ditlhako tse di haphegileng tse di nang le serethe se se sola e borethe e bile e le motsu. Se se latelang, madulo a pitse, segolo jang a modiro wa kwa ga Mmamosadinyana, a na le dinakana tse di babalesegileng tse motho o ka itshwareleleng ka tsone go letla fa maoto a tsenang teng go wela fatshe fa go gogelwa morago ke mopalami fa a wa.
question: Ke eng seo disale tse dingwe di nang le sone, tse di thusang go fokotsa matshwenyego a pabalesego, a lenao la mopagami le ganeletse mo madulong a pitse?

question: Ke eng se se leng mo setlhakong se se faphegileng, se se thusang go oketsa pabalesego ya mopagami fa a dirisa sale ya pitse?
mc_answer1: Sola e e makgwakgwa, e e motsu

flores_passage: Maharathatha a bojanala ke lekgotla le le kopanyang bajanala le benggae mo ditoropong tse ba di etelang. Go tsenelela mokgatlo yo gantsi go tlhokana le go re o tlatse fomo mo enthaneteng; le fa ntswa fa gongwe go ka thokana le go rurifatsa itshupo ya gago go feta foo. Go tswa foo, bajanala ba neelwa mekwalo ya pampiri kgotsa e e mo mafaratlhatlheng a enthanete, fa gongwe e patilwe ke bopaki kwa bajanala ba bangwe. Mothale wa Couchsurfing o tlhamilwe ka Hirikgong ka 2004 rramaranyane wa dikhomputara Casey Fenton a sena go bona sefofane sa madi a a kwa tlase go ya Iceland mme a sena kwa a ka bayang tlhogo teng. O romeletse baithuti ba yunibestithi e e gaufi molaetsa wa email, mme a amogela diphetolo tse dintsi thata, e le tsa batho ba ba reng ba ka mo fa boroko ja mahala.
question: Ke eng se go tweng se ka newa bajanala ka Maharathatha a bojanala?
mc_answer2: Difofane tsa madi a a kwa tlase
mc_answer3: Bakaedi ba selegae ba maeto ba neelana ka maeto a bojanala
mc_answer4: Kgolagano le bajanala ba bangwe ba ba etelang lefelo le le lengwe

question: Go ya ka temana, ke efe ya dipolelo tse di latelang tebang le Mafaratlhatlha a bojanala, tse e seng nnete?
mc_answer1: Bajanala, ka gale, ba neelwa bopaki ka benggae
mc_answer2: Mekgatlho e mengwe e ka nne ya tlhoka gore o netefatse itshupo ya gago go feta foo
mc_answer3: Bajanala ba tla neelwa mekwalo ya pampiri kgotsa e e mo mafaratlhatlheng a enthanete, ya baamogelabaeng ba ba tla bong ba le teng
mc_answer4: Bopaki ka batho ba selegae, ka dinako dingwe, bo nna gone go bajanala

flores_passage: Dihosetele thata di lebantswe banana - ba ga ntsi e leng batho ba dingwaga tse di masome a mabedi go ya kwa go a a kwa tlase ga a masome marataro - mme go ga ntsi bajanala ba bagolwane ba fitlhelwa koo. Malapa a a nang le bana a ga a tlwaelesega, mme go na le dihosetele tse dingwe tse di kgonang go ba fa boroko mo matlong a a sa kopanelwang.
question: Go ya ka temana,ke mofuta ofe wa mojanala yo a ka se bonweng mo ntlong ya hosetele, e e kopanetsweng?
mc_answer1: Mojanala yo o mo dingwageng tsa bomasome a mabedi
mc_answer2: Mojanala yo a tsamayang a le esi
mc_answer3: Mojanala yo a tsamayang le bana ba bannye
mc_answer4: Mojanala yo o mo dingwageng tsa gagwe tsa bo masome a mararo

flores_passage: Dihosetele thata di lebantswe banana - ba ga ntsi e leng batho ba dingwaga tse di masome a mabedi go ya kwa go a a kwa tlase ga a masome marataro - mme go ga ntsi bajanala ba bagolwane ba fitlhelwa koo. question: Go ya ka temana, ke mang yo, gantsi, a ka nnang kwa hoseteleng?
mc_answer1: Balekane ba tsamaya le losea lo lo sa tswang go belegwa
mc_answer2: Batho ba bararo ba dingwaga di le 22 ba tsamaya mmogo
mc_answer3: Balekane ba ba mo dingwageng tsa bo 70
mc_answer4: Malapa a mabedi a a tsamayang le bana ba one

flores_passage: Go latlhela Boomerang ke bokgoni jo bo rategang jo baeti ba le bantsi ba ka ratang go nna le jone. Fa o batla go ithuta go konopa bomareng e e boelang ko letsogong la gago, tlhomamisa gore ona le bomareng ee siametseng go boela letsogong. Bontsi jwa di-boomerang tse di leng teng kwa Australia tota tota ga setse di bowang. Go botoka thata go re ba ba simololang ba seka ba leka go latlhela fa go le diphefo.
question: Go ya ka temana,ke efe ya dipolelo tse di latelang e e tlhalosang ka nepagalo, go latlhela boomerang?
mc_answer1: Ka metlha, e tsile go boela ko letsogong la gago, fa o e konopile sentle
mc_answer2: E ratiwa thata ke benggae go feta bajanala
mc_answer3: Ga go na dibumaring tse di leng gone mo Australia
mc_answer4: Ke dibumaring di se kae fela, tse di kgonang go bowa

flores_passage: E re ka le na le ditlhaketlhake tse 17, 000, dijo tsa Indonesia di akaretsa dijo tse di harologanyeng tsa kgaolo eo yotlhe. Mme, fa le dirisiwa le sa tlhalosiwe go feta foo, go le ga ntsi lefoko leo le raya dijo tse di tlholegang kwa bogareng le botlhabatsatsi jwa setlhakatlhake segolo sa Java. Jaanong ka di bonwa mo kgaolong eo yotlhe, dijo tsa Java di akaretsa mehuta e mentsi ya dijo tse di sa lokwang ka dilo tse di natetshang di le dintsi, mme thata di remeletse mo tirisong ya manoko, pherehere, sukiri (bogolo jang sukuri e e dirilweng ka coconut ya Java) le menatetsha e e harologanyeng e e nkgang monatenate.
question: Ke efe ya tse di latelang, e e dirisiwang thata mo dijong tsa batho ba Java?
mc_answer3: Sukiri e e dirilweng ka khokhonate

flores_passage: Mo go bao ba sa tlwaelanang le mafoko a a itsiweng fela ke ba bongaka, mafoko tshwaetso le tshelana a na le bokao jo bo a farologanyang. Bolwetsi jo bo tshelanwang bo bakiwa ke ditshidinyana jaaka megare, mothuthuntshwane kgotsa megare e mengwe. Bolwetse jo bo tshelanwang ke bolwetse jo bo fetelang motlhofo fela ka go bo o le mo lefelong le lengwe le motho yo o tshwaetsegileng. Bontsi jwa dipuso di tlhoka go re baeti ba ba gorogang, kgotsa baagi ba ba tswang ka naga ya bone, ba entelwe kgatlhanong le malwetse a a farologaneng. Ditlhokafalo tseno ga ntsi di ka ikaega ka se dinaga tse motsamai a di etetseng kgotsa a ikaeletseng go di etela.
question: Go ya ka temana , bolwetse jo bo tshelanwang, bo fetela jang?

flores_passage: Ka gore megala e mo maharathatheng a enthanete, ga go tlhokege go re o dirise mogala wa setlamo sa kwa o nnang teng kgotsa kwa o etelang teng. Gape ga go tlhokagale go re o nne le nomore ya selegae go tswa mo motseng o o nnang mo go one; o ka kgona go nna le nomore ya go gokelelwa mo sathalaeteng ya intanete kwa dikgweng tsa Chicken, Alaska mme o tlhophe nomore e e supang fa o le kwa Arizonia e e letsatsi. Gantsi, o tshwanelwa ke go reka nomore ya lefatshe lotlhe kwa thoko e e letlang go re megala PSTN e go leletse. Koo nomore e tswang teng ke gone go dirang pharologano mo bathong ba ba go leletsang.
question: Ke eng seo se letlang mongwe go dirisa mogala wa setlamo kwa ntle ga fa ba nnang?
mc_answer1: Megala e e mo mafaratlhatlheng a inthanete

flores_passage: Go bitsa mafoko a se-Italy go motlhofo ka go re bontsi jwa mafoko a bitswa fela ka fa a kwadilweng ka teng. Ditlhaka tse di botlhokwa tse o tshwanetseng go di ela tlhoko ke c le g, ka go re ka fa o di bitsang ka teng go tswa mo go reng di salwa morago ke tlhaka ehe. Gape, o tlhomamise go re o harolganya ka fa o bitsang ka teng r le rr: lefoko caro le raya moratiwa, fa la carro le raya kara ya dipitse.
question: Ke efe ya tse di latelang e e sa tlhaloseng ka nepagalo, go bitsa mafoko a se-Italy?
mc_answer1: Di r tse pedi , di bidiwa ka tsela e e farologaneng le r a le mongwe
mc_answer2: Bontsi jwa mafoko a bitswa fela ka fa a kwadilweng
mc_answer3: Mafoko a ditlhaka c le g a ka go tsietsa
mc_answer4: Go bitsa bontsi ba mafoko go farologana go ya ka gore di salwa morago ke tlhaka efe

flores_passage: İzmir ke toropo ya boraro ka bogolo mo Turkey e e nang le baagi ba le dimilione tse 3.7, boemakepe jwa bobedi ka bogolo go latela Istanbul, le lefelo la konokono le le molemo thata la dipalangwa. Motse o bogologolo e neng e le Semerena, ga jaana ke wa bosheng, o tlhabologileng, e bile ke boremelelo jo bo tlhanaselang jwa kgwebo, o o ikadileng go dikologa kgogometso e kgolo e bile o dikologilwe ke dithaba. Mafaratlhatlha a matona, dikago tsa galase ka fa pele le marekisetso a segompieno a kgabisitswe ka marulelo a dithaele tse di khibidu, mmaraka wa lekgolo la bo-18 la dingwaga, mafelo a thapelo le dikereke, le fa gone toropo e na le seemo le ditebego tsa Yuropa ya Mediterranean go na le tse di tlwaelegileng tsa Turkey.
question: Ke dife tsa dibopego tsa Izmir tse di simolotseng pele ga bošeng?
mc_answer2: Dikago tsa galase ka fa pele

mc_answer3: O ka bona marekisetso a segompieno le mafelo a thapelo le dikereke

flores_passage: Go bogelwa ga dithunya tsa Cherry, mo go itsiweng jaaka hanami, ga go bolo go nna karolo ya setso sa Japane go tloga ka lekgolo la bo-8 la dingwaga. Kakanyo ya teng e ne e tswa kwa China kwa dithunya tsa leungo la polamo e leng lelomo le le rategang. Kwa Japane, meletlo ya ntlha ya dithunya tsa dicheri e ne e tshwerwe ke kgosikgolo; a o tshwarela ene le maloko a mangwe a bogosi, gaufi le Kgotla ya Bogosi.
question: Lefoko, hanami, le kaya go bogela eng?

question: Ke mang a neng a tshware meletlo ya ntlha ya go bogela dithunya tsa ditšheri?

flores_passage: Jerusalem ke moshate wa Israel, le fa dinaga ka bontsi le United Nations di sa e tseye e le moshate wa Israel. Toropokgolo ya bogologolo ya Judean Hills e na le ditso tse di kgatlhisang tsa dingwaga tse di diketekete. Toropo e boitshepho mo ditumelo tsa Judaism, Christianity le Islam e bile ke lefelo la tumelo, le tsa setso. Ka ntlha ya botlhokwa ja toropokgolo e mo tumelo ya, segolobogolo mo mafelong a mantsi a kgale a Old City, Jaresalem ke nngwe ya konokono ya mafelo a bojanala kwa Israel. Jerusalem e na le mafelo a ditso, dikago tsa bogologolo le tsa ditso, ga mmogo le mafelo a theko a a tlalang ka batho, mafelo a go iketla le go ja.
question: Go ya ka temana, ke efe ya dintlha tse di latelang tsa Jerusalem tse di ka nneng di a se ngoke bojanala?
mc_answer1: Botlhokwa jwa toropokgolo e mo tumelong
mc_answer2: Dinaga ka bontsi le United Nations ga di e tseye e le mošate wa Israel
mc_answer3: E na le mafelo a tsa ditso

flores_passage: Kruger National Park (KNP) e kwa bokone-botlhaba jwa Afrika Borwa mme e iphaphathile le molelwane wa Mozambique ka fa botlhaba, Zimbabwe ka fa bokone, mme molelwane o o ka fa borwa ke Noka ya Crocodile. Phaka e botona ja dikhilomithara di ka nna 19,500 km², mme e kgaogantswe ka dikarolwana di le 14, nngwe le nngwe e tshegetsa diphologolo ka go farologana. Ke nngwe ya dikgatliso tse ditona tsa Aforika Borwa ebile e bonwa ele sekao se setona sa lefelo la diphologolo la Aforika Borwa (SANParks). Jaaka diphaka tsotlhe tsa Afrika Borwa, go na le tshomarelo le matlole a go tsena go mafelong a letsatsi le letsatsi. Gape go ka nna mosola go re motho a reke Wild Card, e e kgontshang motho go tsena mo diphakeng tse di kgethegileng mo Afrika Borwa, kgotsa tsotlhe.
question: Go ya ka temana, ke mothale ofe wa mojanala yo a ka se ungwelweng ke go reka Wild Card?
mc_answer1: Motho yo o ikaelelang go etela diSANPark ka bontsi jo bo kgonegang
mc_answer2: Motho yo o etelang Kruger National Park fela
mc_answer3: Motho yo o batlang go somarela matlole, a tshwenyega ka madi a go tsena mo phakeng
mc_answer4: Motho yo o ikaelelang go etela Kruger National Park le, bonnye, phaka e le nngwe gape

mc_answer1: E tsewa jaaka e e kgatlhisang e tona mo Aforika Borwa
mc_answer2: Diphologolo di farologana magareng ga dikarolo tse dintsi tsa phaka
mc_answer3: Ke e nnye thata mo diphakeng tsa bosetšhaba tsa Aforika Borwa

flores_passage: Thaba e e mokgokolosa fela thata e, e gantsi e bonalang kwa morago mo dinepeng tsa matlotla a, e ntlheng ya bokone jwa Machu Picchu. Go bonala go le bokete go tswa kwa tlase, mme go motlhotlogelo e bile go thata go ya kwa godimo, mme gone bontsi jwa batho ba ka selekanyo se se rileng ba itekanetseng ba tshwanetse ba kgona go palamela koo ka metsotso e ka nna 45. Mantswe a go gatiwang mo go one a beilwe mo bontsing jwa tsela ya teng, mme mo dikarolong tse di tlhatlogelelang thata tsa megala ya tshipi di neelana ka tshegetso ya matshwaro a diatla. Ka go rialo, solofela go felelwa ke mowa, mme o itlhokomele mo dikarolong tse di motlhatlogo thata, segolobogolo jang fa go le metsi, e re ka go ka nna kotsi ka bonako. Go na le logaga lo lo nnye gaufi le kwa setlhoeng se o tshwanetse go feta ka sone, le kwa tlase thata mme e bile ka le pitlagane thata o tshwanelwa ke go ipateletsa tota go tsena mo go lone.
question: Ke efe ya tse di latelang, e e ka nnang kotsi thata go bapagami go ralala dikarolo tse di motlhatlogo thata?
mc_answer2: Mantswe a go gatiwang mo go one

question: Ke dife tsa dipolelo tseno, tse di sa bontsheng ka nepagalo, go ya kwa godimo ga thaba ya Machu Picchu jaaka di tlhalositswe mo temaneng?

mc_answer4: Dikarolo tse di motlhatlogo di nna kotsi fa go le metsi

flores_passage: Dijo tsa Ma-Jorca, fela jaaka tsa mafelo a a tshwanang nalo mo Mediterranean, di itsheegile ka borotho, merogo le nama, (bogolo jang kolobe), le tiriso ya mafura a olife ka dinako tsotlhe. Selalelo se se ratiwang thata (bogolo thata jang fa go le selemo) ebile se le motlhofo go baakanngwa ke Pa amb Oli: Borotho jo ba kopntsweng le mafura a olive, ga mmogo le tamati le seshabi sengwe le sengwe fela se se teng, jaaka cheese kgotsa tlhapi.
question: Go ya ka temana,ke efe ya tsone e e sa itsegeng ka dijo tse di ratwang thata tsa Ma-Jorca?

flores_passage: Dijo tsa Hangi di apeelwa mo khuting e e bolelo mo mmung. Khuti e gotediwa ka maje a molelo a a tswang mo molelong, kgotsa mo mafelong mangwe metswedi e e pumpunyegang ka mogote e dira go re mafelo a a mo mmung a nne mogote ka tlhago. Khuthi gantsi e dirisetswa go apaya dijo tsa setso tsa maitsiboa. Mafelo a a farologaneng kwa Rotorua a na le hangi ya metswedi e e pumpunyegang ka mogote, fa hangi e nngwe e ka lekelediwa mo Christchurch, Wellington le kwa mafelong a mangwe.
question: Go ya ka tshedimosetso mo temaneng, ke polelo efe ka dijo tsa hangi, e e seng nnete?
mc_answer1: Dijo tsa hangi e e pumpunyegang ka mogote, di apeelwa mo khuting e e bolelo mo mmung, e e gotediwang ka maje a molelo a a tswang mo molelong gore mafelo a a mo mmung a nne mogote ka tlhago
mc_answer2: Dijo tsa Hangi, go dirisiwa maje a molelo, e gone kwa Wellington
mc_answer3: Dijo tsa setso tsa maitseboa, gantsi di apewa ka hangi
mc_answer4: Hangi ya metswedi e e pumpunyegang ka mogote e ka bonwa kwa Rotorua
